name: TWILIO__SEND_SMS
description: Send SMS text messages to phone numbers for customer notifications and automated messaging.

MediaUrl.description: URLs of media files to include (MMS)

StatusCallback.description: URL to receive delivery status notifications

ProvideFeedback.description: Whether to provide feedback on message quality

name: TWILIO__LIST_MESSAGES
description: Retrieve a list of sent and received messages with filtering and pagination options.

name: TWILIO__GET_MESSAGE
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific message including delivery status and metadata.

message_sid.description: SID of the message to retrieve

name: TWILIO__UPDATE_MESSAGE
description: Update message properties such as status callback URL for delivery tracking.

message_sid.description: SID of the message to update

name: TWILIO__DELETE_MESSAGE
description: Delete a message from Twilio logs for privacy compliance and data cleanup.

message_sid.description: SID of the message to delete

name: TWILIO__MAKE_PHONE_CALL
description: Initiate outbound phone calls for voice communication and automated call campaigns.

Url.description: URL that returns TwiML instructions for the call

StatusCallback.description: URL to receive call status notifications

StatusCallbackEvent.description: Events to track for status callbacks

Timeout.description: Time in seconds to wait for answer

name: TWILIO__LIST_CALLS
description: Retrieve a list of phone calls made and received with status and duration information.

name: TWILIO__GET_CALL
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific call including duration, status, and recordings.

call_sid.description: SID of the call to retrieve

name: TWILIO__UPDATE_CALL
description: Update an in-progress call by modifying its status or redirecting to new TwiML instructions.

call_sid.description: SID of the call to update

name: TWILIO__DELETE_CALL
description: Delete call records from Twilio logs for privacy compliance and data management.

call_sid.description: SID of the call to delete

name: TWILIO__LIST_PHONE_NUMBERS
description: Retrieve all phone numbers owned by the account for managing communication channels.

query.description: Query parameters for filtering phone numbers

PageSize.description: Number of phone numbers per page

name: TWILIO__BUY_PHONE_NUMBER
description: Purchase a new phone number for SMS and voice communications from available inventory.

FriendlyName.description: Friendly name for the phone number

VoiceUrl.description: URL for handling incoming voice calls

SmsUrl.description: URL for handling incoming SMS messages

name: TWILIO__UPDATE_PHONE_NUMBER
description: Update phone number configuration including webhook URLs and friendly names.

phone_number_sid.description: SID of the phone number to update

name: TWILIO__DELETE_PHONE_NUMBER
description: Release a phone number from the account to free up resources and stop billing.

phone_number_sid.description: SID of the phone number to release

name: TWILIO__SEARCH_AVAILABLE_NUMBERS
description: Search for available phone numbers to purchase by area code, country, or capabilities.

country_code.description: Country code for phone number search

name: TWILIO__LIST_RECORDINGS
description: Retrieve call recordings for quality assurance, compliance, and analysis purposes.

name: TWILIO__GET_RECORDING
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific call recording including duration and download URL.

recording_sid.description: SID of the recording to retrieve

name: TWILIO__DELETE_RECORDING
description: Delete a call recording permanently for privacy compliance and storage management.

recording_sid.description: SID of the recording to delete

name: TWILIO__LIST_CONFERENCES
description: Retrieve conference calls for managing multi-party voice communications and meetings.

name: TWILIO__GET_CONFERENCE
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific conference including participants and status.

conference_sid.description: SID of the conference to retrieve

name: TWILIO__LIST_CONFERENCE_PARTICIPANTS
description: Retrieve all participants in a conference call for managing multi-party conversations.

name: TWILIO__UPDATE_CONFERENCE_PARTICIPANT
description: Update participant settings in a conference call including mute, hold, and kick operations.

Hold.description: Whether to put participant on hold

name: TWILIO__DELETE_CONFERENCE_PARTICIPANT
description: Remove a participant from a conference call to manage meeting attendance.

call_sid.description: SID of the participant's call to remove

name: TWILIO__GET_ACCOUNT_INFO
description: Retrieve account information including balance, status, and usage statistics.

name: TWILIO__UPDATE_ACCOUNT
description: Update account settings including friendly name and status for account management.

FriendlyName.description: Updated friendly name for the account

name: TWILIO__GET_USAGE_RECORDS
description: Retrieve usage statistics and billing information for monitoring communication costs and volume.

StartDate.description: Start date for usage period (YYYY-MM-DD format)

EndDate.description: End date for usage period (YYYY-MM-DD format)

name: TWILIO__CREATE_APPLICATION
description: Create a Twilio application for configuring voice and messaging behavior across multiple phone numbers.

name: TWILIO__LIST_APPLICATIONS
description: Retrieve all Twilio applications for managing communication configurations and webhooks.

name: TWILIO__GET_APPLICATION
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Twilio application including its configuration.

application_sid.description: SID of the application to retrieve

name: TWILIO__UPDATE_APPLICATION
description: Update Twilio application settings including URLs, methods, and callback configurations.

application_sid.description: SID of the application to update

name: TWILIO__DELETE_APPLICATION
description: Delete a Twilio application permanently to clean up unused configurations.

application_sid.description: SID of the application to delete

name: TWILIO__CREATE_VERIFICATION
description: Start a verification process for phone number validation using SMS or voice calls.

CustomFriendlyName.description: Custom friendly name for the verification

name: TWILIO__CHECK_VERIFICATION
description: Verify a code submitted by user to complete phone number validation process.
